source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

spells.description:
Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 5.3 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 655,214 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 321,887.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Pauldrons of the Hero

spell.description: Use: Activate your personal space amplifier to knockback an enemy within melee range of you. (10 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Use: Grants the user invisibility for 14-18 sec. (10 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 655,214 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 321,887.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Offer to bind your spirit with that of another player also wearing this ring. This binding is permanent, but can be severed at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.
Use: Carve a wax copy of your target, which absorbs 50% of their damage taken. The absorption heats up the wax, causing it to melt after absorbing 4.9 million damage. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cloak of the Hardened Tortoise

spells.description:
Equip: Every 10 seconds in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 146 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Nasz'uro, the Unbound Legacy
